title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 3 categories on the x axis representing Soap Bar Brand, and Sales in million GBP in each Soap Bar Brand on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Dove where Sales in million GBP is 26.8.
The lowest category is found at Simple where Sales in million GBP is 5.8.
The highest value at Dove is almost 4.62 times larger than the minimum value of Simple.
The highest value at Dove is almost 4.62 times larger than the minimum value of Simple.
The difference between the max Soap Bar Brand Dove and min Soap Bar Brand Simple is 21.0.
